duties_responsibilities.duty: Creating, developing, and maintaining training material for tax employees.
Designing, developing, and maintaining instructor-led, and on-demand training to meet employee development needs.
Collaborating and working with tax subject matter experts to create training material.
Assessing and determining training needs and/or knowledge gaps.
Developing user guides/playbooks, and other training material based on the training needs.
Assisting in determining the best delivery of training: instructor led, on-demand, or mix of both.
Generating and editing: images, animations, text, and video for training material.
Working within tight timelines while maintaining a high level of accuracy.
Working independently with minimum supervision demonstrating organization, time management, and teamwork.
Formulating ideas and communicating them in both written and oral format to a wide range of audiences and situations.
Determining the best training tools for delivering the content: GlobalMeet, Broadcast, etc.
Improving E-learning and moving past outdated technology.
Working with leaders in the industry, gaining exposure and visibility within the company.

skills.skill: Education in Tax, Accounting, or Finance

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Instructional Design, Education, or related field (Master's preferred)
